string-array.name: how_to_play_rules
string-array.item: 1. Click on New Game to start a new game.
2. Click on End Game to quit game and declare winner.
3. Score board on bottom of screen.
5. Each player get 2 clicks only in each turn.
6. On matching a pair of color 1 point added to score.
7. Already matched cards cant be clicked again.
8. After each turn colors will be changed for all unmatched cards.
